kernel

Class ComponentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • kernel.ComponentManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectionManagerListener, GUIComponent

    public class ComponentManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConnectionManagerListener, GUIComponent
    Class that manages connecting components (agents, simulators, viewers) to the kernel.

      • registerAgentControlledEntity

        public void registerAgentControlledEntity(Entity entity,
                                 java.util.Collection<? extends Entity> visibleOnStartup,
                                 Config agentConfig)
        Register an agent-controlled entity.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity that is agent-controlled.
        visibleOnStartup - The set of entities that the agent should be sent on startup. If this is null then all entities will be sent.
        agentConfig - A view of the system configuration that should be shared with the agent.

      • waitForAllAgents

        public void waitForAllAgents()
                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Wait for all agents to connect. This method will block until all agent entities have controllers.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted.
